== Introduction ==

<nowiki>[[http://libmtp.sourceforge.net/|libmtp]]</nowiki> brings the Media Transfer Protocol to Linux/GNU. It's based on libptp2, libgphoto2 and libnjb.

== How to file a report ==

Please file a new report via a terminal: <pre>
ubuntu-bug mtp-tools
</pre>

== Information to include in your report ==

 1. If libmtp can't autodetect your player, please add the vendor and device ID from the following terminal command after attaching the device in MTP mode: <pre>
lsusb
</pre>
 1. If you don't know what you need to include, please include the entire output of: <pre>
mtp-detect
</pre>
 1. Attach uncompressed and untarred the entire /var/log/kern.log file.
